definition: exceeding 90 degrees but less than 180 degrees, having an obtuse angle, — see triangle illustration
lacking sharpness or quickness of sensibility or intellect : insensitive, stupid
examples: He is too obtuse to take a hint.

definition: difficult to comprehend : not clear or precise in thought or expression
examples: It is also, unfortunately, ill-written, and at times obtuse and often trivial.
